list.abs: of course i ' m upset , you moron ., 我当然很不安 , 你这个笨蛋.
two morons stand on a cliff arms outstretched . one has some budgies lined up on each arm , the other has parrots lined up arms .两个傻瓜站在悬崖边，伸展双臂。其中一个傻瓜在胳膊上捆了一排虎皮鹦鹉，另一个也绑了鹦鹉。
Our CEO is a real moron . I won ' t do what he says next time ., 我们的 ceo 真是笨蛋 , 我下次再也不听他的了.
two morons stand on a cliff arms outstretched . one has some budgies lined up on each arm , the other has parrots lined up arms .两个傻瓜站在悬崖边，伸展双臂。其中一个傻瓜在胳膊上捆了一排虎皮鹦鹉，另一个也绑了鹦鹉。

entry.def: If you say that a person or their behaviour is moronic, you think that they are very stupid.

example.ex: Most of them are just moronic...
example.tran: 他们大部分不过是废物。
这是无端、愚蠢的恶意破坏。

means.word_mean: 1. having a mental age of between eight and twelve years
